ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] anyone else having problems today?
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have that problem I still can t play the game.  I still get  a dinput8.dll error.  I have been in contact with the tech support people alot recently.
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have that problem I still can't play the game.  I still get  a dinput8.dll error.  I have been in contact with the tech support people alot recently.  Maybe i will finally be able to play the game.
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, March 17, 2002 6:09 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] anyone else having problems today?

I was on EQ and got booted. I tried to get back on and it kept getting to
the login screen. everytime it said Error 1001 could not connect to server.
I tried to load the official EQ webpage. File not found.
Hours later my mom tried on her account. Same thing.
Then mom finally got logged in over 12 hours later. she got to character
select. then tried to login a character but got booted out and got the same
error 1001. Grrr.
Anyone else have this problem?
-Su



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
